entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
